title: Request Penalty Abatement
description: A taxpayer was assessed a failure-to-file penalty but had a reasonable cause (e.g., serious illness).

tasks.description: Review the taxpayer's situation to confirm they meet the criteria for reasonable cause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the taxpayer's circumstances qualify for penalty relief.

tasks.description: Gather supporting documentation, such as a doctor's note.
Draft a letter to the IRS requesting penalty abatement and attach the supporting documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares and sends a compelling request for relief.
